thread.title: Sonic Dash 2: Sonic Boom is out now on iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch
thread.title_full: Sonic Dash 2: Sonic Boom is out now on iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch

title: Sonic Dash 2: Sonic Boom is out now on iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch
text: Friday, Oct 9 2015, 02:57   Twitter Share on Google+ You don't have to wait any longer for Sonic Dash 2: Sonic Boom to come out.The endless-runner sequel, which soft launched earlier this year, is now available worldwide via the App Store on iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch.Set in the world of the Sonic Boom TV series , Sonic Dash 2: Sonic Boom allows players to race with up to three characters in the new Team Play mode and swap runners mid-race to earn high scores.Playable characters include Sonic, Tails, Amy, Knuckles and Sticks . New special abilities include Amy's Hammer, Knuckle's Slam attack, Sonic's faster Dash and more.The game also features swing-and-tilt gameplay with the supercharged Enerbeam, allowing you to tilt your device to swing the runner toward rings and orbs.The original Sonic Dash has been downloaded more than 100 million times. Digital Spy said it was "the best Sonic has played on a smartphone yet" when it launched in 2013.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy 's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
